cast.name: 乔纳斯·斯莫德斯 Jonas Smulders
阿丽亚娜·施洛特 Ariane Schluter
西格丽德·那拍尔 Sigrid ten Napel

introduction: A Good Life (With A Happy Ending) is about the unusual relationship between Helen, a widow who ends up in dire financial straits from one day to the next, and the student, Joeri (Jonas Smulders), who finances his wild and luxurious lifestyle by working as a gay escort.One Night Stand series offers 'new', talented directors and screenwriters the chance to make a contemporary film of fifty minutes and so to take an important step in the development of their talent. The theme of this edition is 'Secret Love'. These films are broadcast on television and premiere at the Dutch Film Festival.
